comment: Show that a structure extending a constructed group (e.g., a ring) is also a group. This allows us to prove that a constructed potential ring ` R ` is a group before we know that it is also a ring. (Theorem ~ ringgrp , on the other hand, requires that we know in advance that ` R ` is a ring.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2013.)
